title: Portfolio Website
description: This portfolio application is built using the NodeJS environment with React and incorporates many common functions of React.

title: crud Dashboard Tool
description: MEAN stack CRUD application to display database data using different methods. This application runs on the NodeJs environment with an Angular frontend and Express backend API. The application incorporates user authentication and authorization. This application incorporated popular libraries such as ChartsJs. This app was created for a Georgian College course.

title: Poll application with live updates
description: Website application that allows users to create and share live polls. This application incorporates both frontend and backend javascript development. The poll voting is automatically updated using web sockets for a live effect. LivePoll is built on the Node.js environment using ExpressJS. The UI for the site is created using the Handlebars library. The website uses an Express server for the crud API. The app and api incorporates user authentication and authorization. This app was created for a Georgian College course.

title: ASP.Net Geocaching App
description: GeoMarker allows users to create and view saved locations on a map. GeoMarker built on the ASP.Net platform and implements user input, user authentication/authorization, MsSQL database CRUD, JSON API, and Bing Map API implementation through Javascript. Bootstrap was used to create the design and responsive layout. This app was created for a Georgian College course.

title: Storymaker Game Toy Game
description: Recreation of the vintage kid's toy Storymaker. This application is created using Javascript and uses the computers text-to-speech to recreat the real toy experience. This applicaiton was created for a Georgian College course.

title: Bootstrap Responsive Website Layout
description: Website layout created using Bootstrap to demonstrate using the css library to create a responsive layout using components. This is a Georgian College class assignment.

title: Responsive Website Layout
description: This is a responsive website design using CSS. This is a Georgian College class assignment.

title: Responsive Website Layout
description: This responsive website layout is a recreation of an existing apparel store website built using CSS and HTML. This is a Georgian College class assignment.

title: Responsive Website Layout
description: Responsive website layout created using CSS and HTML. This is a Georgian College class assignment.

title: Intersection Observer Menu
description: Website design used to demonstate the intersection observer being used to animate a table of contents menu for a website. This is a Georgian College class assignment.
